Class Judge

java.lang.Object
com.hado90.judge.Judge
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavaJudge
public abstract class Judge extends Object
Abstract base class that provides the structure for judging Java programming assignments. This class defines the general flow of judging submissions, including preparation of test criteria, compiling code, running tests, reporting results, and cleaning up resources.

  • Constructor Details

    • Judge

      public Judge(FileManager fileManager, JavaCompilerUtil javaCompilerUtil, JavaTestRunner javaTestRunner, PDFGenerator pdfGenerator)
      Constructs a new Judge instance with the necessary utilities for judging Java assignments.
      Parameters:
      fileManager - the FileManager used for handling file operations.
      javaCompilerUtil - the JavaCompilerUtil used for compiling Java code.
      javaTestRunner - the JavaTestRunner used for running Java tests.
      pdfGenerator - the PDFGenerator used for generating PDF reports.

  • Method Details

    • prepareCriteria

      public void prepareCriteria(String compressedTestFilePath)
      Prepares the test criteria by extracting and compiling the test classes from a compressed file.
      Parameters:
      compressedTestFilePath - the path to the compressed test file (ZIP format).

    • prepareSubmission

      public void prepareSubmission(Submission submission)
      Prepares the student's submission for judging by compiling the submission code.
      Parameters:
      submission - the Submission object representing the student's submission.

    • judgeSubmission

      public void judgeSubmission(Submission submission)
      Judges the student's submission by running the compiled tests and capturing the results.
      Parameters:
      submission - the Submission object representing the student's submission.

    • reportSubmissionResults

      public void reportSubmissionResults(Submission studentSubmission)
      Reports the results of the student's submission, typically by generating a PDF report. This method is a placeholder and can be implemented to generate result reports for students.
      Parameters:
      studentSubmission - the Submission object representing the student's submission.

    • cleanupSubmission

      public void cleanupSubmission()
      Cleans up temporary files related to the student's submission by wiping the contents of the temp/submissions directory.

    • cleanupJudge

      public void cleanupJudge()
      Cleans up temporary files related to the test criteria by wiping the contents of the temp/tests directory.

    • getFileManager

      public FileManager getFileManager()
      Returns the FileManager used for handling file operations.
      Returns:
      the FileManager instance.

    • getJavaCompilerUtil

      public JavaCompilerUtil getJavaCompilerUtil()
      Returns the JavaCompilerUtil used for compiling Java code.
      Returns:
      the JavaCompilerUtil instance.

      public JavaTestRunner getJavaTestRunner()
      Returns the JavaTestRunner used for running Java tests.

      the JavaTestRunner instance.
